com.bluegosling.concurrent

Interface ListenableScheduledFuture<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the future result
    All Superinterfaces:
    Awaitable, Cancellable, Comparable<Delayed>, Delayed, Future<T>, ListenableFuture<T>, ScheduledFuture<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ListenableRepeatingFuture<T>, RepeatingScheduledTask<V>, ScheduledTask<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ListenableRepeatingFutureTask, ListenableScheduledFutureTask

    public interface ListenableScheduledFuture<T>
extends ListenableFuture<T>, ScheduledFuture<T>
    A future that is both scheduled and listenable.
